name: French Onion Soup
description: A classic French soup made with caramelized onions and beef broth, typically served with a cheese-topped toasted baguette slice.
steps: Caramelize the sliced onions in a large pot.
Add beef broth and bring to a simmer.
Season with thyme and bay leaves.
Toast baguette slices topped with grated cheese under a broiler until melted and golden.
Serve the soup hot with the toasted baguette.
tips: Cook the onions slowly to fully develop the sweet flavor.
Use homemade beef broth for a richer taste.
Top with additional cheese if desired.
